content:
Many of the programs and companies I mentioned offer online classes, tutorials, or virtual workshops, which can be a great way to learn from experienced instructors from the comfort of your own home.

Here are a few examples:

**Urban Contemporary:**

1. **Travis Wall's Shaping Sound**: Shaping Sound offers online classes and tutorials on their website, as well as virtual workshops and intensives.
2. **Nuvo Dance Convention**: Nuvo offers online classes and tutorials on their website, as well as virtual workshops and intensives.
3. **24 Seven Dance**: 24 Seven Dance offers online classes and tutorials on their website, as well as virtual workshops and intensives.

**Lyrical Hip-Hop:**

1. **Matt Steffanina's Dance Tutorials Live**: Matt Steffanina offers online classes and tutorials on his website, as well as virtual workshops and intensives.
2. **Monsters of Dance**: Monsters of Dance offers online classes and tutorials on their website, as well as virtual workshops and intensives.
3. **Jazz Funk Fusion**: Jazz Funk Fusion offers online classes and tutorials on their website, as well as virtual workshops and intensives.

**Other Online Resources:**

1. **DanceWithMe**: DanceWithMe is an online dance platform that offers classes and tutorials in various styles, including Urban Contemporary and Lyrical Hip-Hop.
2. **MasterClass**: MasterClass is an online learning platform that offers dance classes and tutorials taught by renowned instructors, including those in Urban Contemporary and Lyrical Hip-Hop.
3. **YouTube**: Many dance instructors and choreographers offer free online classes and tutorials on their YouTube channels, including those in Urban Contemporary and Lyrical Hip-Hop.

These online resources can be a great way to learn from experienced instructors, even if you can't attend an in-person workshop. You can also use them to supplement your in-person training or to learn new skills and techniques.

Remember to always research the instructor and the program before signing up for online classes or tutorials, and make sure they align with your goals and learning style.

Are you excited to explore these online resources and learn more about Urban Contemporary and Lyrical Hip-Hop from the comfort of your own home?
